title: Statins don’t cause most of the side effects on package warnings, study finds
description: Many people who should be taking statins avoid them for fear of side effects. A large new study says most of those side effects don't actually show up.
content: Many people who should be taking statins avoid them for fear of side effects. A large new study says most of those side effects don't actually show up.
